tool_description: The GrammarBot API provides spelling and grammar checking capabilities to your application. Submit text and receive a JSON response with potential errors and suggested corrections.
name: GrammarBot
title: GrammarBot

api_list.name: check
api_list.description: GrammarBot will check the 'text' parameter for any spelling and/or grammatical errors, and respond with suggested corrections.

parameters.name: text
parameters.default: Susan go to the store everyday

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Only en-US or en-GB are supported at this time

utterances.utterance: Can you check the grammar and spelling of this sentence: 'He go to school every day'?

parameters.text: He go to school every day

utterances.utterance: Please find any errors in the sentence: 'She were happy with the results'.

parameters.text: She were happy with the results

utterances.utterance: Check this text for grammatical mistakes: 'They is playing in the park'.

parameters.text: They is playing in the park

utterances.utterance: Could you correct the grammar in this sentence: 'I has a dog'.
Identify any spelling errors in: 'The cat jump over the moon'.

parameters.text: The cat jump over the moon

utterances.utterance: What are the grammatical errors in: 'We was going to the market'?

parameters.text: We was going to the market

utterances.utterance: Can you find the mistakes in this sentence: 'She don't like apples'.
Please check for errors in: 'He do his homework every night'.

parameters.text: He do his homework every night

utterances.utterance: Correct the grammar in: 'The book are on the table'.

parameters.text: The book are on the table

utterances.utterance: Find any grammatical issues in: 'I am go to the store'.

parameters.text: I am go to the store
